{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=

Constructs an {{rlpt|/|adjacent_transform_view}}.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/default_initialization|Default-initializes]] the underlying data members {{rlpi|/#Data members|fun_}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}}.

@2@ Move constructs the underlying data members: {{rlpi|/#Data members|fun_}} with {{c|std::move(fun)}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}} with {{c|std::move(base)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|base|the underlying view}}
{{par|fun|the N-ary transformation function}}
{{par end}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;algorithm&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;iterator&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr static auto v = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
    constexpr auto mul = [](auto... x) { return (... * x); };
    constexpr auto view = std::views::adjacent_transform&lt;3&gt;(v, mul);
    std::ranges::copy(view, std::ostream_iterator&lt;int&gt;(std::cout, " "));
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
6 24 60
}}
